name: Dragon`s Checkers
description: Your pawns are at the bottom of the board. In your turns you move one of your pawn diagonally to one of a nearest square. You can destroy enemy's pawn by jumping diagonally over it. Note: If you can destroy enemy's pawn you MUST do it.That's the rule.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and higher Processor: simple core, 2 GHZ Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Any card with 128 MB Storage: 141 MB available space
